author: Zeta
name: Rimworld Mod Template
description: A project for creating Rimworld mods using C# and Xml.

postActions.description: Restore NuGet packages required for this project.

manualInstructions.text:
Run `dotnet restore` in the new project directory to install NuGet dependencies.
Check packages with `dotnet list package` to ensure everything is installed correctly.
Remember, `dotnet build` will build the project and check for any issues.
